desc.en:
The Deception skill is a class skill that allows you to turn an identified item into an un-identified item. This allows players to raise appraisal skill from a couple of items or to seed their inventory with junk items to fool thieves (Hellsgate) or simply to try to raise some extra money by fooling someone into buying unidentified items that turn out to be junk.

This skill is available to the following classes:

  • Bard
  • Crimelord
  • Deceiver
  • Thief
  • Trickster

It may also be obtained from bonuses on items.
